summary: Project involves an app with entity tag handling and a "binôme profile" tab where profile photos should update after being saved.
known_issues: Entity tag does not save when adding a new tag (e.g., "T2I").
Profile photo in the "binôme profile" tab does not refresh/update after selecting and saving a new photo.

existing_features.title: Fix profile saving so that the selected/updated profile picture (predefined avatar or custom upload) is not overwritten by a subsequent profile save, and ensure any UI that renders user avatars (including the “binôme profile” tab) reflects the new picture immediately after a successful save.

Allow saving a user profile entity value even when it is a newly typed entity (not present in suggestions), and ensure newly saved entities appear in entity suggestions thereafter. Support and validate examples including: "T2I", "IVV", "Qualite", "IMI", "RLI".

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix entity tag creation/saving when adding a new tag (e.g., "T2I"); support/validate tags such as T2I, IVV, Qualite, IMI, RLI.
Update the profile photo in the "binôme profile" tab immediately after a new photo is chosen and saved.

projectName: Fix entity saving for new values and refresh profile photo in binôme profile after update
